titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Records of the Office of the Executive Vice-President, William E. Lavery, 1968-1974
titlestmt.subtitle: Lavery, William E., Records of the Office of the Executive Vice-President RG 4/3

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-07-03 15:43:18 -0400.

change.item: Laurel Rozema corrected name from Records of William E. Lavery, Third Executive Vice-President of Virginia Polytechnic Institute to Records of the Office of the Executive Vice-President, William E. Lavery.

titlepage.titleproper: Records of the Office of the Executive Vice-President, William E. Lavery, 1968-1974
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections RG 4/3

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Records of the Office of the Executive Vice-President, William E. Lavery, 1968-1974
did.physloc: Please note: This collection is in off-site storage and requires 2-3 days notice for retrieval. Please contact Special Collections for more information.
did.abstract: This collection contains correspondence and other official records of Lavery during his year as Executive Vice-President before becoming President of the University. Collection includes materials concerning budget matters, Board of Visitors, Computing Center, Computer Science, Community Colleges, each of the Colleges, Building Committee, Institutional Research, Task Force for Innovative Approaches to Instruction, University Council and Commissions, V.P.I. Industry Center, and Virginia Public Telecommunications Council.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Records of the Office of the Executive Vice-President, William E. Lavery must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Records of the Office of the Executive Vice-President, William E. Lavery, RG 4/3, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to Special Collections.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection is in its original order. Additional description was completed in 2010 when the existing HTML inventory was converted to a finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: The position of Executive Vice-President was established in 1968 as a result of the reorganization of the University's top-level administration. Lavery was the last of three individuals to hold the position before its elimination in 1974. William Lavery became the President of Virginia Polytechnic Institute that same year, serving until the end of 1987. His records as for this period are not yet available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains correspondence and other official records of Lavery during his year as Executive Vice-President before becoming President of the University. Collection includes materials concerning budget matters, Board of Visitors, Computing Center, Computer Science, Community Colleges, each of the Colleges, Building Committee, Institutional Research, Task Force for Innovative Approaches to Instruction, University Council and Commissions, V.P.I. Industry Center, and Virginia Public Telecommunications Council.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is in its original order.
